summary: A new mage-like race for Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][b]Currently in Alpha, May be buggy. Be expecting updates.[/b][/size]
[size=5][b]Add screenshots if you can![/b][/size]




[size=4] What is this mod? [/size]
This is a race mod. Currently still adding more things, such as, quests, shops, followers, etc.
[size=4] What is a Magi? [/size]
A Magi, also know as Mages, are very skilled when it comes to spells. They can revive their friends, or demolish their enemies.
[size=4] Why is the description so short?[/size]
That is a very good question. The description is so short because I want to get the community's opinion. Their opinion could help me decide what I should add to this mod.
[size=4]What are you currently adding/doing?[/size]
Currently, I'm adding a quest line. :D I am hoping I can make followers, a new area, etc.
[size=4]Requirements[/size]
None. :D
[size=4]Installation[/size]
Extract the file and plop it into Skyrim/Data

Race bonuses:
I tried to keep it even with the other races
Destruction: 5
Restoration: 5
Illusion: 5
Alteration: 5
Conjuration: 5
Alchemy: 5
Enchanting: 5

All of them equal out to 35, which is equal to the other races.

Racial resists:
Damage
Magic

Racial spells:
Boost Healing Rate
(Boosts healing rate :P)
author: EpicMegaBoss
